content.raw:
Hi Carlos and Rumman,

I also made some other changes to the `spawn_model` node of the vrx.launch script.  You will also need the arg;

> -robot\_namespace $\(arg namespace\)

This is what sets the namespace of the spawned object.

Due to the possibility of having multiple different models, I also moved the robot description to the namespace as well.  

> -param $\(arg namespace\)/robot\_description

Regards,

Jonathan Wheare.

Hi Carlos and Rumman,

I also made some other changes to the spawn_model node of the vrx.launch script. You will also need the arg;

-robot_namespace $(arg namespace)

This is what sets the namespace of the spawned object.

Due to the possibility of having multiple different models, I also moved the robot description to the namespace as well.

-param $(arg namespace)/robot_description

Jonathan Wheare.
